website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Hellas are an appealing set of wireless workout headphones that can also be used for running and everyday use.
pros: The Urbanears Hellas are an attractively designed, lightweight, sweatproof wireless Bluetooth headphone with a removable headband and earpads that are washable
The headphones are pretty comfortable (for on-ear) and stay on your head securely, even while running
They have touch controls that work well and the sound is decent for Bluetooth
cons: They look a plastic-y, and they work OK, but not great as a headset for cell phone calls
Material on earpads is slightly rough out of the box

customer_reviews.title: i love these
customer_reviews.text: Love them. The only drawback is that my old pair is primitive garbage in comparison so using those is torture now. The controls on these are simply amazing. The word intuitive has been thrown around a lot but the controls on these are actually intuitive. Now I never have to carry my phone at the gym, I just set music playing and i can easily skip or pause from the headset while im wearing it. Easily. They're comfortable, more breathable than any other pair ive seen, the sound quality is excellent, the colors are great, they fold, they are tight enough to stay on while i move, but not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyessster

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and sound , the swipe sensor makes the listening experience a joy.....BUT there needs to a lock button or something . When I place them in my back pack I turn them on , when exercising I pause the music. I also like to know the battery life prior to walking out the door and not wanting to overcharge I have been out and they died on me.. When powered up my lesser headphones say the time left .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, But Scratchy Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the gym because I hate ear buds and I didn't want a cord potentially getting snagged during my workouts (I weightlift 5x a week). Sound quality is good, the touch controls work well (although during overhead movements if my arm bumps them they activate the controls and I have to bump them again). Only complaint is that the fabric is not that comfortable and actually feels kind of scratchy. Sound quality is good for the price and the battery life goes forever. Took a sec to get synced up to my Samsung Galaxy 7 but after that haven't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rose Ndife

customer_reviews.title: Died in less then one year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year & the battery has already completely died, or something has broken. Nothing happened to them & no visible damage. They just won't charge or work anymore. To expensive to not even last one full year. I recommend getting something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Orden

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: The unique volume and on/off control is difficult at times. I like that you can remove the ear and head pieces to wash (I strongly recommend hand wash). If you are going to use this for Peloton workouts I suggest you understand any overhead presses with dumbbells may move the headphones off your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6months
customer_reviews.text: One side that holds and slides the headphone broke off after 6 months :(
customer_reviews.author: JVA

customer_reviews.title: ... and I could be wrong but it doesn't look like it's going to stand the test of time difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: Work very well for use on my Peleton bike but am a bit worried about the recharge receptive and I could be wrong but it doesn't look like it's going to stand the test of time difficult to plug in cable. But outside of that they work great
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these and after 5 months they will no ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and after 5 months they will no longer charge when pulled in!!! I contact the Urban earz with proof of purchased and they want to send you through a laundry list of requirements before they will consider a warranty claim....the warranty states 1 year!!! So be where of purchasing this brand as Urban earz is not customer service friendly.....UPDATE..... I purchased a second set of the Hellas (this time the red ones) and again the same result.....The Hellas headphones are not any good at all and their customer service is again terrible even being in the one year warranty period
customer_reviews.author: Eric Green

customer_reviews.title: touch controls are annoying as
customer_reviews.text: flimsy, it doesn't have the corded option. touch controls are annoying as hell
customer_reviews.author: Serkan Y.

customer_reviews.title: I love these. The only problem is adjusting the volume ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The only problem is adjusting the volume and scanning controls; they require a fine touch and I have yet to master it yet. I would still buy them again as this has not affected my enjoyment of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Bill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: scratchy itchy and not great sound. so wanted to love them.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Over all great phones
customer_reviews.text: Love them, great sound and battery life and love the swipe controls. Can be very slightly uncomfortable after a long time on the ears and feel a little flimsy. Although they have been hanging in with no damage so far.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for working out. Sound quality is decent. Have never fallen off during any of my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: jack rivera

customer_reviews.title: Without original packing
customer_reviews.text: This item came without the original packing!!! I was really disappointed!!! I bought two different colors as a gift for my nephews and it was disgusting to give one well packed and the other in a plastic bag!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Maria de Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality and controls. Absolutely hate earbuds so these are as good as it gets for working out. Minus a star for having the black color out of stock for so long, as well as having no Bluetooth battery level support.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: broke down after only a couple of weeks. Unpairs after every use, no volume,
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Last
customer_reviews.text: They worked for 5 months great. Then even while I was connected to my media and they were Fully charged NO Sound came out. I re-paired it with Bluetooth and still have issues. NOT Happy
customer_reviews.author: Robin Effler

customer_reviews.title: Made a great mother's day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a mother's day gift for my wife and she loves them. Perfect for the gym, even on heavy cardio days. They stay snug even while running full speed on the treadmill. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: These are great for working out and running
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out and running! They stay on beautifully and are designed to wick sweat away. These headphones are soooo much nicer than any earbuds I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for working out!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Perfect for active workouts, and easy to clean. Couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worthless---don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless! Will not sync with IPAD PRO; IPHONE 7 or IPOD Touch. Tried all the tricks (hold closer, turn Bluetooth on and off, reset Apple devices, fully charged headphones), etc. Nothing works so my advice is go elsewhere cause this is a really expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Jim OwensTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Trouble connecting
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get them to connect to any of my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Solomos

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. The swipe interface works perfectly for me. They connected to my iPhone 7 quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: What a sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great sweat absorbing perfect for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing product from a great company.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Urbanears, I've purchased several of their wired products over the years. I'm pretty disappointed with these headphones though. On the plus side, the sound is decent, and the run pretty long off of a single charge. On the downside, the swipe interface is a little wonky, sometime when I try to increase volume, I'll inadvertently skip ahead a track. Also, the charging port is super finicky. It only works with a few of the cables I have, and even then it's a struggle to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.author: David Sc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: poor sound quality, not enough volume to even use more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: A true sweat proof pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: The real appeal for me is the fact that I can remove and wash the covers and ensure that the speakers won't be ruined by the my abundant sweat. Overall, great headphones for those who are heavily sweat during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Returned, did not work
customer_reviews.text: Could not pair with any Bluetooth source and I tried several, several time. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are a pretty OK upgrade from the original ADV Wireless set and I say OK and I mean it. They work exactly the same, GONE are the horrendous flakey pleather ear cushions (oh and the ear cushions are interchangeable between the ADV Wireless and the Hellas btw), the antenna is slightly worse but it could just be my phone, this new version has NO 3.5mm jack on it AND they're more expensive. For what!? Because they don't want you to have the cloth ear cushions without paying for a new set. I think I'm done with Urbanears until they change their sheisty business practices
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wotring

customer_reviews.title: Update they no longer work!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Holds up to sweat well. Sound quality isn't like Bose but didn't expect it to be. Good purchase, I recommend them. I run about 15 miles a week. UPDATE 11/9 - they no longer work. Won’t power on. Mine lasted only a few months so beware.
customer_reviews.author: moneycop1067

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these I couldn't get them to connect to my iPhone, read a couple of reviews here and read that they couldn't pair with Apple devices and got worried. I then messaged the Urbanears help center and got a quick response on instructions on resetting the headphones and they now connect seamlessly, I have always used Urbanears, the sound is awesome and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: A Tad Too Tight - If not getting these for running.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, and maybe after a while it might be more comfortable, but since these are good for exercising they are a bit tight and uncomfortable for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: ManoaHI

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for a few months and then stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Worked and sounded fine until a few months in and then it stopped holding charge and became useless. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

product_meta.title: Urbanears Hellas On-Ear Active Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, Trail (4091225)
product_meta.description: Color:BlueSweat friendly and cord-free, there's no holding back with these wireless Bluetooth headphones for running and working out. The meshy, washable ear cushions and headband take moisture like a champion. A built-in swipe interface lets you cycle your playlist and pick up calls without hunting for buttons. Hella cool.
feature_bullets: ACTIVE DESIGN : Hellas stay in place and out of the way whether you’re running laps or doing an upside-down crunch
BLUETOOTH : These headphones are wireless and Bluetooth-ready with up to 14 solid hours of playtime on a single charge
SWIPE INTERFACE : The built-in swipe interface lets you cycle through your playlist and pick up calls with a simple swipe and tap
WASHABLE FABRIC : Remove the headband and ear cushions after your workout and toss them in the wash

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars77 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
